actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage investment in small companies.
short_title: Small Investment Tax Relief Act of 2004

summary.text: Small Investment Tax Relief Act of 2004 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a noncorporate taxpayer a tax exclusion for up to $100,000 of the gain from the sale of exchange of certain publicly traded small business stock held for more than one year.

titles.title: Small Investment Tax Relief Act of 2004
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage investment in small companies.
